summary: Spices up ye olde Breezehome with a good, old fashioned torture chamber.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod for Skyrim, with a little experience from Oblivion modding.

I thought it would be good to add a little addition to Breezehome, so there you are, a torture chamber.

There\'s also a chest in there with something nice.

Installation:
Install with Mod Manager or just copy the .esp file in your Data folder.

Compatibility:
I only replaced the wall right before the stairs, to make room for the door, and deleted the boxes from beneath the stairs.
It should be compatible with any mod not dealing with that one wall.


Any feedback would be appreciated.



The sword in the screenshot is Berserk Dragonslayer by Phate3:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3143
author: ultimatepowah
